mapper.select: select type,sum(money) as allInMoney,sum(cmms_amt) as allCharge from pay_finance_account_detail where status = 1 and wechat_account_status = 2 and store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by type

SELECT data_status, sum(money) AS todayInMoney FROM pay_finance_account_detail WHERE status = 1 and wechat_account_status = 2 and out_in_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') and store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by data_status

SELECT out_type, sum(money) AS todayOutMoney,sum(cmms_amt) as todayCharge FROM pay_finance_account_detail WHERE STATUS = 1 AND type = 1 and out_in_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') and store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY out_type
SELECT SUM(coupon_hxd_money) + sum(coupon_brand_money) AS useCouponAllMoney FROM pay_finance_account_detail WHERE STATUS = 1 and store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT SUM(coupon_hxd_money) + sum(coupon_brand_money) AS useTodayCouponAllMoney FROM pay_finance_account_detail WHERE STATUS = 1 and out_in_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') and store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT SUM(pw.real_fee) AS realFee, SUM(pw.cmms_amt) AS cmmsAmt FROM pay_finance_account_detail pfad LEFT JOIN pay_withdrawals pw ON pw.withdrawals_no = pfad.order_no WHERE 1 = 1 AND pfad.`status` = 1 AND pfad.out_type = 1
AND to_days(pw.created) = to_days(now())

SELECT SUM(pr.refund_amount) AS refundAmout FROM pay_finance_account_detail pfad LEFT JOIN pay_refund pr ON pr.order_no = pfad.order_no WHERE 1 = 1 AND pfad.`status` = 1 AND pfad.out_type = 2
AND to_days(pr.created) = to_days(now())
